snippet: If American-made armored personnel carriers passed to Hezbollah from the Lebanese Army, as an Israeli official said, that might point to a broader leakage of weapons....

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and BEN HUBBARD
byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner reported from Tel Aviv, and Ben Hubbard from Beirut, Lebanon. Helene Cooper contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: If American-made armored personnel carriers passed to Hezbollah from the Lebanese Army, as an Israeli official said, that might point to a broader leakage of weapons.

headline.main: Hezbollah Is Using U.S.-Made Military Vehicles in Syria, Israel Says
headline.print_headline: Hezbollah Is Using U.S.-Made Armor in Syria, Israel Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
